sentence.Network_en: It is just one kilometer from the hotel to the site of the sailing race.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒店离帆船比赛场地只有1000米远.

sentence.Network_en: Chichester was already 58 years old when he won the first solo transatlantic sailing race.
sentence.Network_cn: 奇切斯特在首届横渡大西洋单人航海赛中夺魁时,已经五十八岁.

sentence.Network_en: Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
sentence.Network_cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。

list.abs: 帆船运动 sailing 帆船比赛 sailing race 帆板运动 windsurfing 级别 class 龙级 Dragon class 索林级 Soling class 星级 Star class 49人级 49er class 欧洲级.
sailing races are due to start on August 9 , weather permitting .如果天气状况允许，奥运帆船项目将于8月9号开赛。
a racing yacht sailed by a picked crew ., 经过精选的队员所驾驶的赛艇.
xiamen - hongkong sailing racing sets sail today ., 厦门香港大帆船赛今日扬帆.
international sailing racing recruits city volunteers ., 国帆赛招募城市志愿者.

means.word_mean: 1. a race between crews of people in yachts
